name: majid/phptopdf
description:
laravel 4.2 package to converting html or php to pdf, this package also have the ability to get the url and return pdf which was generated from specified url
    this is an online service so you need intermet access to use this package.sign up in www.phptopdf.com then get the key and then open your_project_path/vendor/phptopdf/src/Majid/Phptopdf/phptopdf.php
     go to line 5 and copy and paste the API_KEY you have taken from www.phptopdf.com
